Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 14th overall pick, by Detroit in 2019...
Traded from Detroit to Philadelphia on 3/2/2019 (Going to DET: SS James Nowell. Going to PHI: C Juan Forest)...
Injured on 8/19/2019 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from Philadelphia to Houston on 3/2/2020 (Going to HOU: CF Hugh Lalonde, C James Howell, C Juan Forest. Going to PHI: 3B Tyler Gauna)...
Injured on 4/11/2020 with a Fractured Nose, out for 6 days...
Injured on 6/17/2020 with a Bruised Heel, out for 5 days...
Injured on 4/4/2021 with a Fractured Ulna, out for 4-5 weeks...
Injured on 8/23/2021 with a Fractured Nose, out for 5 days...
Was claimed off waivers by San Francisco on 3/2/2022.
Injured on 7/30/2022 with a Bruised Foot, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit on 8/4/2022, off Ryan Loya (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/14/2022, off Tim Zimmermann (BRO)...
Released by San Francisco on 10/20/2022...
